data.name: Warframe:  Tennocon 2022 Digital Pack
data.detailed_description:
The pack features:

  • TennoCon 2022 Operator Suit Bundle
  • TennoCon 2022 Armor Bundle
  • TennoCon 2022 Sugatra
  • TennoCon 2022 Display
  • TennoCon 2022 Emote
  • TennoCon 2022 Glyph
  • TennoCon 2022 Sigil
  • 475 Platinum

  • Plus, you'll get access to Baro's entire inventory during his TennoCon 2022 Relay! There you'll be able to trade Ducats for everything Baro has ever sold.

Baro's TennoCon Relay is open from July 16, 2022 at 11 a.m. ET to July 23, 2022 at 11 a.m. ET.

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.

data.short_description: Instantly add exclusive TennoCon items to your Arsenal, available now for a limited time only!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Video:DirectX 11+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:35 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.
